dt: {bc}a lightweight, low-powered motorbike that can be pedaled

dt.t: The difference between a {wi}moped{/wi} and a scooter is like the difference between an economy car and full-sized coupe. A scooter has comfy footrests instead of pedals and a luxurious seat seemingly long enough to accommodate a family of four.
The Motorman may fit the legal definition of a {wi}moped{/wi}, but it has no pedals. The drivetrain is fully electric.

A {wi}moped{/wi} is defined as either a pedal bicycle with a helper motor or a non-pedal bicycle with a motor, which has all of the following characteristics: Have a cylinder capacity of no more than 50 cubic centimeters. Have an automatic transmission. Be capable of a maximum speed of no more than 30 miles per hour. Comply with all applicable federal motor vehicle safety standards.

shortdef: a lightweight, low-powered motorbike that can be pedaled; broadly : any low-powered motorbike

dt: {bc}to give oneself up to brooding {bc}become listless or dejected

dt.t: I was feeling depressed and just {it}moped{/it} around all day.
the little woman does {wi}mope{/wi} along in traffic

dt: {bc}to act in a dazed or stupid manner

shortdef: to give oneself up to brooding : become listless or dejected
to move slowly or aimlessly : dawdle
to act in a dazed or stupid manner
